name: Pedal To The Medal
description:
The game "Pedal To The Medal" is a racing and strategy game which shows an adrenaline junkie named "Mike" who decides to try rally racing for the first time. He is determined to collect as many coins as possible whilst on the track, whilst maintaining his three lives.

HOW TO PLAY

- Collect as many coins as possible in 60 Seconds.

- Big coins are worth 5 points and small coins are worth 8 points. 

- Avoid the hazards - Cactuses can be avoided by moving left and right and Puddles of Water by jumping over them, or moving left or right. 

- Both Cacti and Puddles of Water will knock 1 of 3 lives from your health.

- Puddles of Water will knock 1 of 3 lives from your health and reduce your score by 20.

- Collect Heart powerups along the way to increase your amount of lives left on the character by 1. 

- Enjoy!
